text: Niilo Nikunen (14 June 1913 - 19 July 1991) was a Finnish skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Finnish male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Finland Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:People from Lemi
title: Niilo Nikunen
